paragraphs: Book added by Tundra Homestead from the Creation Club
This home, and its surrounding environs, is available for purchase.
I have had many cherished adventures in Skyrim, but now I am afraid I must leave it behind. The war has made life difficult on all of us, and I fear that the worst is yet to come.
I have entrusted the steward in Dragonsreach with managing the sale of my homestead. If interested, please seek him out.
